thread.title: Watch The National’s Matt Berninger Perform At Game Of Thrones Concert In Las Vegas
thread.title_full: Watch The National’s Matt Berninger Perform At Game Of Thrones Concert In Las Vegas

author: Stereogum
title: Watch The National’s Matt Berninger Perform At Game Of Thrones Concert In Las Vegas
text: The National recorded a version of "The Rains Of Castamere" for the Game Of Thrones: Season Two soundtrack, and on Saturday night, Matt Berninger performed it live. A full orchestra and a choir are doing the Game Of Thrones score live on tour right now, and during Saturday's show at the MGM Grand Garden … More »
